value:
So many offerings suitable for my
dark altar... What? This has nothing to
do with you!

I should have been the one the White
Sage chose!$k$pI've said it beforeâ€”Miloah was all talk.
I was the rightful successor!

Anyone foolish enough to threaten
me will quickly learn the true terror
of my dark magic...

You are too powerful to waste your
time here. You should follow your
true desires...

Silence! Do not draw attention to me.
Not here...

This place smells of the blood spilled
in war... The depths of its darkness
are profound.

So long as I possess this dark power,
they cannot snuff my life out!

Only a fool would raise a hand to
strike me!
How...

Let the darkness roar and the stars
gleam! All will be as I will it to be...

I am the Pontifex Gharnef. Some call
me the Dark Pontifex. That is fitting.
Let us dye the world with shadow!

I see how you look at me. You know
the question I mean to ask you...$k$pWhat is the source of your power?
I cannot divine it. Just what are you?$k$pI am the Dark Pontifex. I am feared
by all. I am no longer human, and I
steal the light away with my darkness.$k$pYet to your enemies, you must
appear like a dark ruler, too...
Controlling spirits, bringing death...$k$pHeh heh heh... It seems you do not
understand. You are more like me
than you realize.$k$pDark ruler $Nu...$k$pDominate your foes. Bend this world
to your will. Each of us may lead our
own realm, according to our whims...
Ha!
Die!
Ugghh!
Miscalculation...
Darkness consumes all!
How reckless.
I am undying.
Imhullu!
I shall await you.
Heh heh heh...
Heh heh heh... 'Tis I, Gharnef.
Make no mistake... I am well aware that the inferno awaits me.
Miloah's daughter... Linde, was it? A little girl does not possess the power to defeat me.
The power of the Dragon Scion Tiki is not to be underestimated...
Long ago, I was one of the White Sage's two disciples. His other disciple? Why, he was murdered. By my own hand.
So, White Sage... Do you scorn the student who strayed from the path you set?
You wish to command the Dark Pontifex? Heh heh heh... What a fool you are.
Very well.
Cower before Imhullu.
The world will end.
